movie.title: Pompeii
movie.writer: Janet Scott Batchler (screenplay), Lee Batchler (screenplay), Michael Robert Johnson (screenplay)
movie.actors: Kit Harington, Carrie-Anne Moss, Emily Browning, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje
movie.plot: A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.
